xsl:value-of.select: concat('select Item_id,unit_weight,organization_code,createts,CREATEUSERID,modifyts,MODIFYUSERID from yfs_item where unit_weight=0 and length(trim(Item_id))>20 and organization_code=', $apos, 'TITAN_GCC' ,$apos, 'and item_id in (select item_id from TITAN_DADI_INV_AVL_STAGING where AVAILABLE_QTY>0) order by createts desc')

concat('select Item_id,unit_weight,organization_code,createts,CREATEUSERID,modifyts,MODIFYUSERID from yfs_item where unit_weight=0 and length(trim(Item_id))',$gt,'20 and organization_code=', $apos, 'TITAN_GCC' ,$apos, 'and item_id in (select item_id from TITAN_DADI_INV_AVL_STAGING where AVAILABLE_QTY',$gt,'0) order by createts desc')

CustomSQL.Query: select Item_id,unit_weight,organization_code,createts,CREATEUSERID,modifyts,MODIFYUSERID from yfs_item where unit_weight=0 and length(trim(Item_id))>20 and organization_code='TITAN_GCC'and item_id in (select item_id from TITAN_DADI_INV_AVL_STAGING where AVAILABLE_QTY>0) order by createts desc

select Item_id,unit_weight,organization_code,createts,CREATEUSERID,modifyts,MODIFYUSERID from yfs_item where unit_weight='0' and length(trim(Item_id)) > '20' and organization_code='TITAN_GCC' and item_id in (select item_id from TITAN_DADI_INV_AVL_STAGING where AVAILABLE_QTY>'0')order by createts desc

xsl:value-of.select: concat('select Item_id,unit_weight,organization_code,createts,CREATEUSERID,modifyts,MODIFYUSERID from yfs_item where unit_weight=', $apos, '0', $apos, ' and length(trim(Item_id))',$gt, $apos, '20', $apos, ' and organization_code=', $apos, 'TITAN_GCC' ,$apos, 'and item_id in (select item_id from TITAN_DADI_INV_AVL_STAGING where AVAILABLE_QTY',$gt , $apos, '0', $apos, ') order by createts desc')

concat('select Item_id,unit_weight,organization_code,createts,CREATEUSERID,modifyts,MODIFYUSERID from yfs_item where unit_weight=', $apos, '0', $apos, ' and length(trim(Item_id))',$gt, $apos, '20', $apos, ' and organization_code=', $apos, 'TITAN_US' ,$apos, 'and item_id in (select item_id from TITAN_DADI_INV_AVL_STAGING where AVAILABLE_QTY',$gt , $apos, '0', $apos, ') order by createts desc')

CustomSQL.Query: select Item_id,unit_weight,organization_code,createts,CREATEUSERID,modifyts,MODIFYUSERID from yfs_item where unit_weight='0' and length(trim(Item_id))>'20' and organization_code='TITAN_GCC'and item_id in (select item_id from TITAN_DADI_INV_AVL_STAGING where AVAILABLE_QTY>'0') order by createts desc

select Item_id,unit_weight,organization_code,createts,CREATEUSERID,modifyts,MODIFYUSERID from yfs_item where unit_weight='0' and length(trim(Item_id))>'20' and organization_code='TITAN_US'and item_id in (select item_id from TITAN_DADI_INV_AVL_STAGING where AVAILABLE_QTY>'0') order by createts desc

xsl:value-of.select: concat('select Item_id,unit_weight,organization_code,createts,CREATEUSERID,modifyts,MODIFYUSERID from yfs_item where unit_weight=', $apos, '0', $apos, ' and length(trim(Item_id))',$gt, $apos, '20', $apos, ' and organization_code=', $apos, $org ,$apos, 'and item_id in (select item_id from TITAN_DADI_INV_AVL_STAGING where AVAILABLE_QTY',$gt , $apos, '0', $apos, ') order by createts desc')
